item.title: Getting started with open source contributions
item.description: The world is moving to open source. From indie developers to multi-billion dollar companies, everyone is making a significant impact on the world by making their software open. If you want to contribute to Firefox, or the core of a new programming language, but are not sure where to start, you start here!

item.title: How do spammers harvest your e-mail address?
item.description: This is an update on the research I did under the guidance of Jeff Huang (now assistant professor at Brown University) titled How do spammers harvest your e-mail address?.

item.title: My year in open source and side projects!
item.description: Ok wow. What an year it has been. A lot happened with me in my personal life - both good and bad - but I'll try to refrain from speaking (or writing, technically) about them here.
